price: 34. Ceux qui sont pieux auront auprès de leur Seigneur les Jardins des délices.
arabic: إِنَّ لِلۡمُتَّقِينَ عِندَ رَبِّهِمۡ جَنَّٰتِ ٱلنَّعِيمِ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: inna lil'muttaqīna ʿinda rabbihim jannāti al-naʿīmi
